meanings.definition: A plant of the parsley family with large leaves and umbrella-shaped clusters of white or pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The hogweeds in the garden have big leaves and pretty flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw some hogweeds growing by the riverbank.
meanings.sent3: The hogweeds in the field were having a party with their colorful umbrellas.
meanings.sent4: The hogweeds stood tall like guardians with their white and pink umbrellas.
meanings.sent5: The hogweeds swayed gracefully in the breeze, their flowers shining in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The common name for plants of the genus Heracleum, which includes giant hogweed and common hogweed.
meanings.sent1: Have you ever seen hogweeds like giant hogweed or common hogweed?
meanings.sent2: The hogweeds in the park are all part of the Heracleum genus.
meanings.sent3: The hogweeds at the botanical garden were gossiping about giant hogweed's height.
meanings.sent4: In the world of plants, hogweeds like giant hogweed reign supreme.
meanings.sent5: The field was filled with hogweeds of all kinds, from common hogweed to giant hogweed.
